I cant get into my banking on my pc. The two-step appl was not removed. Called customer service back AGAIN!!!!. Now rep tells me she cant remove it now to do my mobile banking. She had to check with her supervisor and finally got the 2-step appl removed from my home pc AGAIN!!!! But, also telling me, I cant no longer do mobile banking without the two-step app it as it is now required by their banking system. Ok, I will be inconvenienced but as long as I can do my online banking on my home pc, I'll be ok...The next day, for the 3rd day in a row, I cant do my online banking on my pc again without the 2-step appl kicking backed in again. Why are these people advocating an application which doesnt work!!!! Do I have to be inconvenience again and called customer back again for the third time? Heck with that.
